meanings.definition: Showy or flashy ornaments or decorations
meanings.sent1: The room was filled with colorful fallals that sparkled in the light.
meanings.sent2: She loved to wear all her fallals when going to a party.
meanings.sent3: The clown's costume was covered in oversized fallals that made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her jewelry box was a treasure trove of fallals, each piece more extravagant than the last.
meanings.sent5: The Christmas tree was adorned with shimmering fallals that caught the eye of every guest.

meanings.definition: Trinkets or baubles, especially those that are gaudy or ostentatious
meanings.sent1: The market was full of vendors selling cheap fallals to tourists.
meanings.sent2: She collected vintage fallals from flea markets to add to her collection.
meanings.sent3: The little girl's room was a colorful mess of fallals scattered everywhere.
meanings.sent4: Her taste in fallals was loud and extravagant, reflecting her personality.
meanings.sent5: The costume designer adorned the actors with fallals to match the whimsical theme of the play.
